sys_ui_macro.description: Inserts an image representation for the current flow.
sys_ui_macro.name: client_login_details
sys_ui_macro.xml:
var css = new GlideRecord("content_css"); css.addQuery("name", "login-details"); css.query() css.next(); var cssid = ""+css.sys_id; var src_name = current.source.participant_name; var is_sender = gs.getUser().hasRole('x_305439_digital_m.app_sender'); var is_receiver = gs.getUser().hasRole('x_305439_digital_m.app_receiver'); var src_name; var details; if(is_sender){ src_name = current.source.participant_name; details = "(" + src_name + " sends files to ST Relay)"; } else if (is_receiver){ src_name = current.destination.participant_name; details = "(" + src_name + " pulls files from ST Relay)"; } 
Configure client login details for  $[src_name]. $[details].
